Name: Bunker
Description:
Defensive structure.
Infantry fights from inside.

Bonus: +1 range to units inside.

Root.Tooltip: Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Channel the shield into the weapon to increase the attack damage by +2 for 10.0 seconds. Remove 15 of the unit's shield.
Root.Name: Power to the Weapon

Root.Tooltip: Sends unloaded infantry units to designated point.
Root.Name: Set Bunker Rally Point

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip: Loads infantry into Bunker.
Root.Name: Load

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Unloads all units.
Root.Name: Unload All

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip:
Warp the building to the targeted powered location.
Takes 20.0/17.9 seconds to finish at Power Level 2/3.

Warning: once Warping is triggered, it cannot be canceled.
This will also cancel any ongoing production.
Root.Name: Warp to Location

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 3

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 2

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 1

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Normal Power Level

Root.Tooltip: Targeted unit is stunned for 8 seconds (3 seconds against heroic units).
Root.Name: Lockdown

Root.Tooltip: Deals 32 damage (64 against armored/massive) to target enemy unit over 8 seconds and slow them down by 50%.
Root.Name: Corrosive Blast

Root.Tooltip: Ground units and structures under the Disruption Web range is reduced by 3. Last 15 seconds.
Root.Name: Disruption Web

Root.Tooltip: Drain a nearby ally shield to recharge up to 0 shield points of the target.
Root.Name: Transfer Shield Power

Root.Tooltip:
A careful shot, dealing 150 damage. Ignores armor.

Can only target psionic.
Root.Name: Sniper Psi-Round
